reply.message: Hi there, Linda. We appreciate your feedback so we can continue to improve our products and services. It’s members like you that help make MoneyLion ROAR! To provide better information, after you unlock Instacash, the exact amount you have available each Instacash cycle (typically time with your pay cycle) will be based on factors in your linked checking account, primarily whether we can detect recent qualifying income and are able to predict when you'll be able to repay your Instacash. If we detect recent qualifying income, you'll have access to up to $200 depending on the income amount. If we can't, you'll have access to a lower amount but not less than $25. In other words, as your linked checking account's financial factors change (such as an increase, decrease, or change in the regularity of in detectable income), your Instacash limit may go up and down between $25 and $200 accordingly. Similarly, if the amount of your deposit goes up or down, your Instacash limit may go up and down with it. The maximum amount you will have access to is $250. If we cannot determine if the direct deposit in your MoneyLion checking account is regularly recurring (i.e with a standard pay frequency of either weekly, bi-weekly, semi-monthly or monthly) you'll have access to a lower amount but not less than $50. Given you’ve expressed a positive experience with MoneyLion, would you be open to also sharing this review on other review sites, including Google Play, Apple Store, BBB, and Wallethub. Thanks again for being the best part of MoneyLion!

reply.message:
You can earn back your memberhsip payment! Every month, you’ll receive a cash payout based on how much you engaged with your MoneyLion membership in the previous 30 days. For example, the more you spent and the higher your daily login streak, the more monthly cash you’ll earn. Bonus: When you switch to this new program, you’ll get an extra payment based on your financial behavior over the previous 30 days! 
Please review the following link to learn more about Lion share rewards:
https://moneylion.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/360032619292-What-is-the-Lion-s-Share-Loyalty-Program-
We appreciate your feedback, and if you have any other questions about our Credit Builder Plus membership, please feel free to contact us.

reply.message: Tipping is optional, and whether you choose to tip doesn’t affect your eligibility in any way. Pay what you think is fair, or don't pay at all, it's up to you. Just be sure to read the screens and make your selections carefully, and you can use Instacash without tips or fees if you choose. That said, if you choose to leave a tip — thank you! It helps us cover the costs of providing 0% APR cash advance to many, many folks like you!

text:
Absolutely LOVE MoneyLion! I get direct deposits through them and get my paycheck two days earlier! Since I do direct deposit through MoneyLion, they offer me instacash through them too! Which is money that MoneyLion let's you borrow from them until payday! Which can be from $50 up to $260! How AWESOME right? Absolutely FREE too! 
I use my card any and everywhere! To pay bills, get gas, at the grocery store, and at the ATMs to get cash money. I have never had one issue with this company or their debit card. 
I absolutely love them and would highly reccomend them to anyone!
title: Absolutely LOVE MoneyLion
